message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this offer represents a fair deal for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is my final offer.
